content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position (117.5, -30.5)), boiler(position (111.5, -32.0)) and offshore pump(position (107.5, -33.5))

### Copper plate mine at position(60.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill and a furnace at position(60.0, -60.0)
-  Burner inserter at position(60.5, -61.5) that puts into furnace at position(60.0, -60.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
-  No assembling machine or inserter found in the logs, but there are belts at positions (63.5, -53.5) and (64.5, -53.5)

### Pipe network at position(107.5, -34.5)
Consists of pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -33.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -31.5)

### Pipe network at position(111.5, -33.5)
Consists of pipes at positions (111.5, -33.5), (112.5, -33.5), (113.5, -33.5), (114.5, -33.5), (115.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using boiler but being out of fuel
-  Make sure to refuel the boiler with coal before using it
### Errors when using steam engine but being not connected
-  Ensure the steam engine is connected to a pipe network and has input liquid before using it
### Errors when placing entities but being too far
-  Move to the target position before placing entities
### Errors when using offshore pump but being not connected to a pipe network
-  Connect the offshore pump to a pipe network before using it

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables defined in the logs.
